name: The Light of the Darkness
summary:
The Light of The Darkness is a deep 2D action RPG with platform elements and free exploration in a style known as "metroidvania". The game is based it´s on an own mythological universe, with narrative focus on the characters and story. Seeks an intriguing and epic feeling, with an art going into the direction of digital painting and fleeing from the pixel art trend.

- Featured Characteristics
Dark Souls meets Castlevania.
High quality of art, effects and animations.
Deep lore built on a solid foundation.
Remarkable characters and assets.
Great potential for cross media, expansions, sequels, licensing.
Free exploration leading to high replay value.
Sophisticated game play challenging the player to mastering the game.

- Technical Characteristics
Genre: Action RPG and Platformer.
Style: “Metroidvania” 2D.
Length: Dozens of miles of non linear exploration.
Game time: 13 to 30 hours of gameplay.
Game Play Elements: Spells; Combination of Spells, items; Weapons; Attribute based combat; Open Level, Platform.
Platforms: PC, Mac, iOS, Android. (Consoles after).
Number of Players: 1 or 2 (cooperative).
Game Presentation Vídeo: https://youtu.be/g08L08QLwIw
storyline:
Synopsis

After the occurring of a terrifying attack in his hometown, Sephius, a pale peasant, goes after a army of dark beings which carried his loved ones as prisoners. Following they to a place called Lands of Oblivion, Sephius is brutally attacked and thrown into a pit to his certain death. But Sephius did not died. Most than that he had raised as a strange mestizo creature with both light and dark natures. Sephius then would to struggle in this mysterious place in order to go out alive, while he tries to figure out what happened to him.
